text: Richárd Zsolnai (born 28 March 1995) is a Hungarian professional footballer who plays for Diósgyőri VTK. ==Club statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |-||-||-||-|- |rowspan="9" valign="center"|Vác |- |2012–13 |0||0||4||1||–||–||4||1 |- |2013–14 |26||19||6||3||–||–||32||22 |- |2014–15 |27||17||3||3||–||–||30||20 |- |2015–16 |28||5||0||0||–||–||28||5 |- |2016–17 |22||4||0||0||–||–||22||4 |- |2017–18 |35||6||5||1||–||–||40||7 |- |2018–19 |35||11||2||2||–||–||37||13 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||173||62||20||10||0||0||193||82 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Diósgyőr |- |2019–20 |1||0||2||0||–||–||3||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||1||0||2||0||0||0||3||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Budafok |- |2019–20 |7||0||0||0||–||–||7||0 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background- color:#eeeeee;" |Total||7||0||0||0||0||0||7||0 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Ajka |- |2020–21 |2||1||0||0||–||–||2||1 |- |- style="font- weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |Total||2||1||0||0||0||0||2||1 |- |- style="font-weight:bold; background-color:#eeeeee;" |rowspan="2" valign="top"|Career Total | |183||63||22||10||0||0||205||83 |} Updated to games played as of 5 August 2020. ==References== *MLSZ *Soccerway Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Budapest Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Vác FC players Category:Diósgyőri VTK players Category:Budafoki LC footballers Category:FC Ajka players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság II players
